title: Self-Directed Learning Competency Enhancement Program Based on Flipped Learning in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and ability to use online learning tools
context.additional_context: Conducting in-depth science learning in a flipped classroom environment utilizing an online platform. Students engage in project-based activities during class based on pre-learning materials.

learning_goals: Learners can independently explain core science concepts at 80% or higher accuracy through pre-learning materials.
Learners can present at least two problem-solving strategies through peer interaction in class discussions.
Learners achieve a score of 4 or higher on evaluation criteria by demonstrating the ability to apply science theories to real-world cases through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
